root: ^It's important to note, that while just plugging in to the PCIe slot is sufficient for many cards, sometimes you also have to plug a power supply cable in to the card for extra power. This is common on more powerful graphics cards.
^When it comes to purchasing a graphics card, there are two main brands: AMD and Nvidia. Both brands have their benefits and weaknesses, but nowadays they will both work well for most needs.
^Purchasing a good graphics card can be expensive, but may be necessary if you want to play video games on maximum quality settings, or render 3D animations.

^It is recommended that you go with a reasonably priced, mid-range graphics card for most gaming needs, and if you only plan on using simple software, purchasing a separate graphics card may not even be necessary.
^Now, let's move on to the Power Supply!
